alert.note: Alert for Sabine; San Augustine; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 12:25AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Webster, De Soto, Red River, west central Natchitoches, southern Caddo, southwestern Bienville, southern Bossier and Sabine Parishes, eastern Shelby, eastern San Augustine and Sabine Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1223 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blanchard to 8 miles south of Stonewall to 7 miles west of Zwolle to 6 miles west of Browndell. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. A 46 mph wind gust was measured from these storms at the Shreveport Regional Airport at 1216 am. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Bossier City, Minden, Mansfield, Milam, Haughton, Greenwood, Blanchard, Many, San Augustine, Coushatta, Stonewall, Zwolle, Logansport, Ringgold, Sibley, Hemphill, Pineland, Doyline and Converse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northwestern Louisiana...and eastern Texas.
